org.openadaptor.core
Class Response

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Response
public class Response
extends java.lang.Object

Class that encapsulate the output data from an IMessageProcessor. The Response is an ordered collection of three different types of output data.

  • Output data that form the sucessful processing of the input data
  • Discarded input data
  • MessageExceptions that are a result of unsuccessful processing of the input data
The batches are modelled as public inner classes Response.OutputBatch, Response.DiscardBatch and Response.ExceptionBatch Use getBatches() to extract the ordered list of batches from a Response and Response.DataBatch.getData() to extract the output from each batch.

Author:
perryj
See Also:
IMessageProcessor
